name: obsidian-rive-plugin
description: WIP: Embed and control Rive (.riv) animations inside Obsidian notes

scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
scripts.bump:patch: node auto-version.mjs && git add package.json manifest.json versions.json && git commit -m 'chore: auto patch bump' || echo no-change
scripts.push:version: node append-build-version.mjs && git add package.json manifest.json versions.json && git commit -m 'chore: append build version bump' && git push

author: CseperkePapp
